description.p: Test the following and preceding XPath axes
description.author: Wolfgang Meier

test.p: Eins zwei drei vier zwei fünf sechs.
test.para: The stopwords should not be indexed.

expected.p: Eins zwei drei vier zwei fünf sechs.

test.task: XML query test 1: boolean with must, matches
test.code: let $qu := <query><bool><term occur="must">eins</term><term occur="must">zwei</term></bool></query> for $hit in doc("/db/test/text1.xml")//p[ft:query(., $qu)] return $hit

expected.p: Eins zwei drei vier zwei fünf sechs.

test.task: XML query test 2: boolean with must, no match
test.code: let $qu := <query><bool><term occur="must">eins</term><term occur="must">sieben</term></bool></query> for $hit in doc("/db/test/text1.xml")//p[ft:query(., $qu)] return $hit

test.task: XML query test 3: boolean with should
test.code: let $qu := <query><bool><term occur="must">eins</term><term occur="should">sieben</term></bool></query> for $hit in doc("/db/test/text1.xml")//p[ft:query(., $qu)] return $hit

expected.p: Eins zwei drei vier zwei fünf sechs.
